channel.title: New client
channel.description:
hey guys, ummm with the new client. i downloaded it and used winrar to extract and you have to go on "run bat" i click on that and it comes up with this black box saying cant run java or something and says press any key to continue... so i press a key and the thing closes..?
any idea's
help pot/...X[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:39:46 AM[/size][hr]any-one know??[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:44:26 AM[/size][hr]its the virsion 3 one

item.title: New client
item.dc:creator: @pot12341 pot12341
item.description:
@pot12341 wrote:

it wont let me paste it to show you? its ::

““c:\documents and settings\dan\my documents\programs>JAVA -xmx500m - jar client.j
ar 0 0 highmen members 0
unable to access jarfile client.jar””

thats what it says
then basically the same thing up to programs and says press any key to continue[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:52:25 AM[/size][hr]little help, bit stuckk… :eek:[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 10:08:28 AM[/size][hr]i’ll take that as a no-one is going to help
